name: gun man (itch)
description:
a fun retro fps where you're lost in an empty city full of monsters this game is kinda like serious sam meets doom. you know this game is good when the difficulty is harder than getting kicked in the shin with a story deeper than a 14-year-olds Twitter post. this game is completely free but u can donate if u like the game I hope u have a fun time playing gun man

controls 

wasd to move and look and control or left click to shoot
